name: Clean National Post
description: Clean National Post hides all of the ads and the subscription prompts, leaving you with just the pure objective journalism typical of the National Post.
additional_info:
Version: 1.3.0

Notes: 
-removes paywall elements
-removes ads
-removes that stupid "Post Points" fixed footer
-removes "related", "most popular", video embeds, and marginalia in stories
-removes most elements in the sidebar (keeps the search bar)
-styles should apply to the majority of the National Post's ecosystem
